resources.string: Find and eliminate the Undercover players and Mr. White before they win.
Each player receives a word. Civilians share the same word, Undercover players have a similar one, and Mr. White receives no word.
Each player gives a one-word clue related to their word, without revealing it directly.
Then all players vote on who they believe is the impostor. The player with the most votes is eliminated.
The game ends if only impostors remain or they are eliminated.
Do not say your exact word. Be strategic. Mr. White can win by correctly guessing the civilians word when eliminated.
There must be at least 3 players, with at least 2 civilians.
